description:
Take part in the all-new Porsche Series event and unlock legendary cars, such as the 718 Type 982 Cayman GT4 and the famous 911 930 Turbo, which you will be able to drive in all of the other game modes.
Embark on an exclusive Porsche competition containing:
- A new seasonal game mode
- 3 new championships
- 2 new exclusive Porsches and...
- A legendary Porsche at stake
- As well as a few surprises!
If you feel up to the challenge, join the competition!
name: Porsche Series - Gear.Club Unlimited 2
